Type	TV Series, 12 episodes
Year	02.04.2004 till 18.06.2004
Categories	Ecchi, Romance, SciFi, Seinen, Sudden Girlfriend Appearance, Super Power

Takemoto Takeru, an ordinary high schooler, encounters a strange light during a bike delivery for his part time job.
When he stops and searches the surroundings, he observes a cute girl named Hikari climbing out of a sparkling cocoon in the forest.
Takeru instantly falls for her at first sight, but suddenly a monster appears at the same spot and attacks the girl.

This is a story about the exciting days of the mysterious girls Hikari and Akari, Takeru&#039;s childhood friend Nishino Mari and his classmates, who all come onto the scene.
Actually these are just ordinary days, but in Hikari&#039;s point of view, they are wonderful.
